channel.title: Nothing real hard just don't know what to search
channel.description:
Anyone have the skill codes like
Attack - 1 Def - 2 Str - 3 ect.. Just good to have for keeping notes.

item.title: Nothing real hard just don't know what to search
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:13, topic:422013”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=524690.msg3818752#msg3818752 date=1321576315]

Alright, so I would make like a Skill.java and add that, and just whenever I use it add imports to the file I want to use it on?
[/quote]
Umm basically. Whenever you would need it import the Skill class at the top of your file. Then to reference each value you would do Skill.SKILL_NAME; Get it?[/quote]

Thanks, and yes I get it.

Read full topic
item.source: Nothing real hard just don't know what to search

Alright, so I would make like a Skill.java and add that, and just whenever I use it add imports to the file I want to use it on?[/quote]
Umm basically. Whenever you would need it import the Skill class at the top of your file. Then to reference each value you would do Skill.SKILL_NAME; Get it?

item.title: Nothing real hard just don't know what to search
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:6, topic:422013”][quote author=Kozs link=topic=524690.msg3818728#msg3818728 date=1321575473]

Anyone have the skill codes like

Attack - 1
Def - 2
Str - 3
ect… Just good to have for keeping notes.

You should make a Skills class and somewhere in there add integers that are labeled like the skills. For example, whenever you wanted to reference crafting, instead of typing in 12, you could do Skills.CRAFTING; Much easier to remember.

Like? Config.java

[/quote]
Lol, name doesn’t really matter. Just whatever you would remember. I said Skills since it would contain Skill ids, but I guess you could add it into Config since it is a configuration. Or Constants class since they are constants throughout the server. :P[/quote]

But how would I do that, could you start me off or something that could help (not spoon feeding)

Read full topic
item.source: Nothing real hard just don't know what to search

item.title: Nothing real hard just don't know what to search
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:4, topic:422013”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=524690.msg3818725#msg3818725 date=1321575367]

Anyone have the skill codes like

Attack - 1
Def - 2
Str - 3
ect… Just good to have for keeping notes.

You should make a Skills class and somewhere in there add integers that are labeled like the skills. For example, whenever you wanted to reference crafting, instead of typing in 12, you could do Skills.CRAFTING; Much easier to remember.
[/quote]

Like? Config.java[/quote]
Lol, name doesn’t really matter. Just whatever you would remember. I said Skills since it would contain Skill ids, but I guess you could add it into Config since it is a configuration. Or Constants class since they are constants throughout the server.

Read full topic
